Jus regium coronæ, or, The King's supream power in dispensing with penal statutes more particularly as it relates to the the two test-acts of the twenty fifth, and thirtieth of His late Majesty, King Charles the Second, argu'd by reason, and confirm'd by the common, and statute laws of this kingdom : in two parts / auctore Jo. Wilsonio J.C. Wilson, John, 1626-1696.
[8], 79 p.
Printed by Henry Hills ... and are sold at his printing-house ..., London : 1688.
First part only. No more published. Cf. DNB. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
=======
